example: accounting methods/practices/procedures. The lawsuit alleges that the company "has engaged in a pattern of questionable business and accounting practices".
As people accumulate more wealth, they tend to spend a greater proportion of their incomes.
He'll be a great asset to the team.
As a senior citizen, he is allowed to audit university classes.

meaning: (n)ngân sách, ngân quỹ, (v) lên ngân sách
example: The firm has drawn up a budget for the coming financial year.

meaning: tăng cường, gom lại, tích lại
example: The build-up of troops in the region makes war seem more likely.

He managed to pay off his debts in two years.

meaning: có lợi, sinh lợi, sinh lãi
example: It was several months before the company started to trade profitably.
Large supermarkets have high turnovers (= their goods sell very quickly).
